document_data.name: Ariser Creed
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ariser Creed''' was one of the major [[illithid]] [[Creed (illithid)|Creeds]] in the Realms. They sought to dominate the surface world. They believed that the best way to obtain exclusive knowledge was by attacking knowledge storehouses on the surface. For many years, the Arisers wished to plunder [[Candlekeep]].<ref name ="DDGttUpp22,81">
document_data.Bases:
The Arisers had a base called the [[Darkened Vault]] in [[Oryndoll]]. It was a minor faction in the city, unlike in other illithid hives.

This Creed also founded a colony at [[Tellectus]], with the aim of stealing from Candlekeep.<ref name ="DDGttUpp22,81"/>
